Amazonia_Therapy_Vitaoils.title: Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils
Amazonia_Therapy_Vitaoils.description: Indicated as 100% Alignment, Vitaoils is enriched with coffee extract and hazelnut oil has emollient properties, nourishing, moisturizing, preventing drying and dehydration of hair. Easily absorbed by the hair cortex, it has an efficient moisturizing action, being a great treatment option for dry hair.

productsInformation.title: Description
productsInformation.content: Indicated as 100% Alignment, Vitaoils is enriched with coffee extract and hazelnut oil has emollient properties, nourishing, moisturizing, preventing drying and dehydration of hair. Easily absorbed by the hair cortex, it has an efficient moisturizing action, being a great treatment option for dry hair.

productsInformation.title: How To Use
productsInformation.content: Do the lock test before using the product. Wear suitable gloves. Wash hair with shampoo 2 to 3 times. Dry the hair in about 80%, separate the hair into 4 parts and apply the product strand by strand using a pencil, align the hair with a fine comb and let it act for 60 minutes. Rinse 80% of product with water, blow dry with hair dryer and flat iron in fine hair strand 10-15 times each. Wait 15 minutes and then thoroughly wash the hair using shampoo and conditioner Vitaoils.

productsInformation.title: What it does
productsInformation.content: Formulated with a powerful blend of amino acids, a smoothing & hydrating agent, Vitaoils from Amazonia Therapy fights frizz and reduce volume while adding shine. Shea Butter with combination of a nourishing mix of oils (including Avocado Oil, Sweet Almond Oil & Hazel Seed Oil) leave hair soft but not greasy or weighed down. The Powerful multi-amino-acid blend adds strength, improves manageability, reduce volume, and gives hair a healthier appearance.

productsInformation.title: What else to know
productsInformation.content: Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils contains Aloe Vera which gives the strands layer the maximum moisturizing from the deep inside to the last layer out. Sulfate Free, Paraben Free, Cruelty Free, Formaldehyde & Derivative Free, Dyes Free, 1-4 Dioxane Free, Heavy Metal Free.

IngredientDetails.title: Shea Butter
IngredientDetails.description: Contains vitamin A and E with essential fatty acids which are believed to add moisture and shine to the hair. Its non-greasy quality makes it an excellent moisturizer for the hair. It softens dry brittle hair and repairs split damaged ends.

IngredientDetails.title: Coffea Arabica Seed Extract
IngredientDetails.description: A powerful ingredient that is rich in keratin, it helps to increase hair elasticity, and impart shine to dull hair.

IngredientDetails.title: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract
IngredientDetails.description: A powerful ingredient that is rich in keratin, it helps to increase hair elasticity, and impart shine to dull hair.

IngredientDetails.title: Blend of powerful Amino acids
IngredientDetails.description: Remove frizz, reduce volume, smoothen, add shine & glow, maintaining the natural movement of the hair strands.

IngredientDetails.title: Avocado Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Extremely rich in oleic acid and monounsaturated fats, making it one of few oils that can penetrate the hair layer and moisturize hair, rather than sitting on top and coating the hair fiber. These fats also strengthen the hair layers and help prevent breakage.

IngredientDetails.title: Sweet Almond Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in magnesium, calcium, and zinc, helps to improve the texture of the hair strands.

IngredientDetails.title: Hazelnut oil
IngredientDetails.description: Powerhouse of fatty acids, proteins, and vitamins, which can nourish hair, maintaining good hair moisturizing & glow.

productsInformation.title: LOCK TEST
productsInformation.content: Do the lock test before using the product. Wear suitable gloves. Wash hair with shampoo 2 to 3 times. Dry the hair in about 80%, separate the hair into 4 parts and apply the product strand by strand using a pencil, align the hair with a fine comb and let it act for 60 minutes. Rinse 80% of product with water, blow dry with hair dryer and flat iron in fine hair strand 10-15 times each. Wait 15 minutes and then thoroughly wash the hair using shampoo and conditioner Vitaoils.

productsInformation.title: Ingredients
productsInformation.content: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Peg-90m, Propylene Glycol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Shea Butter, Coffea Arabica Seed Extract, Aloe Barbadenis Leaf Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Glycerin, Arginine, Serine, Proline, Glycine, Alanine, Glutamic Acid, Aspartic Acid, Threonine, Isoleucine, Valine, Histidine Hcl, Phenylalanine, Dmdm Hydantoin, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Pca, Polyquaternium -10, Corylus Avellana Seed Oil, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium Edta, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Fragrance.

Amazonia_Therapy_BI_BTX.title: Amazonia Therapy BI-BTX
Amazonia_Therapy_BI_BTX.description: BI-BTX is a hair treatment that promotes the creation of new structural bridges in the hair fiber that guarantee the strengthening of weakened areas. Rich in fibroin, Hydrolyzed Keratin and Macadamia Oil, it maintains hair nutrition at an ideal hydration level against dryness. Result: Hair deeply reconstructed, protected with softness and shine.

productsInformation.title: Description
productsInformation.content: BI-BTX is a hair treatment that promotes the creation of new structural bridges in the hair fiber that guarantee the strengthening of weakened areas. Rich in fibroin, Hydrolyzed Keratin and Macadamia Oil, it maintains hair nutrition at an ideal hydration level against dryness. Result: Hair deeply reconstructed, protected with softness and shine.

productsInformation.title: How To Use
productsInformation.content: 1. Apply the BI-BTX to clean and dry hair.2. With the help of a hair dye brush, apply the product at half centimeter from the roots Strand by Strand, using a fine-toothed comb for better distribution of the product. Leave it for 40-60 minutes, per the need of the strand.3. After the pause, lead the client to the wash basin to rinse the hair removing the excess of the product to make the completion easier.4. wipe and dry hair completely with the help of a brush and a hair dryer.5. Iron with Nono-titanium hair straightener on fine Strands about 10 times in the average each Strand till sealing the strands.

productsInformation.title: What it does
productsInformation.content: Formulated with a unique blend of powerful bioactive ingredients that offers a long-lasting, smooth & silky feeling. Amazonia Therapy BI-BTX has to affinity not only to straight the hair but also replenish the moisturizing and emollient actives into the hair layer while forming a highly substantive & protective film to seal and protect the hair fiber from external damages, so hair looks smoother, straighter, and more lustrous with healthy appearance.

productsInformation.title: What else to know
productsInformation.content: Amazonia Therapy BI-BTX contains a variety of powerful biocompatible ingredients that make this clean treatment the safest on hair & health.Sulfate Free, Paraben Free, Cruelty Free, Formaldehyde & Derivative Free, Dyes Free, 1-4 Dioxane Free, Heavy Metal Free.

IngredientDetails.title: Macadamia Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in fatty acid content, the real winner for skin and hair. Those fatty acids help to add shine, strengthen, and nourish the hair follicles, macadamia oil is great for calming the hair of frizz, tangles, and dullness.

IngredientDetails.title: Hydrolyzed Keratin
IngredientDetails.description: Maintains the health, youth and strengthens the hair: hair is shinier, Stronger and less brittle.

IngredientDetails.title: Linseed Seed Extract
IngredientDetails.description: Contain up to 6 % polysaccharides as acmucilage like arabinoxylan, galactose, glucose rhamnogalactouronane and fucose. It acts as an emollient which repair stressed & damaged hair.

IngredientDetails.title: Sericin
IngredientDetails.description: Natural silk bioactive extract produced by the silkworm Bombyx mori. The unique silk protein SERICIN has strong affinity to keratin. It forms a highly substantive, protective film, imparting an immediate, long-lasting, smooth & silky feeling.

IngredientDetails.title: Fibroin
IngredientDetails.description: Excellent water-binding and absorbing protein which is non-toxic and biocompatible. It works by coating the cuticles of the hair strands. This seals in the moisture and protects the bonds so hair looks smoother and straighter. The other bonus point is that it adds shine, giving hair a more lustrous and healthy appearance.

IngredientDetails.title: Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone
IngredientDetails.description: 100% active matter and ready-to-use conditioning agent which is biodegradable and non-toxic. It provides smoothness and anti-static properties to the hair.

IngredientDetails.title: Fucus Vesiculosus Extract
IngredientDetails.description: Contain the well-known elements collagen and other nutrients that are responsible for hair recovery, hydration & mineralisation, owing to the abundance of zinc and vitamins A and C.

productsInformation.title: Ingredients
productsInformation.content: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Macadamia Ternifolia Nut Oil, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Water, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Polyquaternium-7, Sericin, Fibroin, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Bis-cetearyl Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-10, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Propylene Glycol, Peg-90m, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Butylated Hydroxy Toluene, Dissodium Edta, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

Amazonia_Therapy_Vitaoils_Shampoo.title: Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils Shampoo
Amazonia_Therapy_Vitaoils_Shampoo.description: With its texture and creamy formula, promotes the cleaning of the strands with a moisturizing, reconstructive and protective action on the fiber of multi-processed hair, the Vitaoils Shampoo from Amazônia Therapy is the perfect choice for those who have chemically damaged hair.

productsInformation.title: Description
productsInformation.content: With its texture and creamy formula, promotes the cleaning of the strands with a moisturizing, reconstructive and protective action on the fiber of multi-processed hair, the Vitaoils Shampoo from Amazônia Therapy is the perfect choice for those who have chemically damaged hair.

productsInformation.title: How To Use
productsInformation.content: Apply on wet hair and wash slightly first time to remove the waste that hinder the formation of foam. Rinse and reapply the shampoo, massaging the scalp gently until it forms a rich, creamy foam. slide lather to the tips then rinse the hair. Follow with Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils conditioner for best results.WARNING: For external use only. Use only as directed. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes.

productsInformation.title: What it does
productsInformation.content: Soothing and strengthening amino acids and extracts help prevent water loss and add smoothness and shine while acting as a heat protectant to hair. Antioxidant -and fatty-acid-rich oils such as Avocado oil, Sesame seed oil, and Macadamia add moisture without weighing hair down. A multi-vitamin-protein blend adds strength, improves manageability, and gives hair a healthier appearance with visible body and bounce. Vitamin E and Sunflower seed oil help boost water content and prevent dehydration. Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils Shampoo has a pH of 5.5.

productsInformation.title: What else to know
productsInformation.content: No Sodium Chloride (or any harsh surfactants) here! That means a gentle, creamy foam cleanse, safe for color-treated hair and won’t strip or rob your hair of its natural shine but will help reboot your scalp and strands by washing away styling-product buildup.Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils Shampoo contains a blend of moisturizing Fruit Olive oil and Red Algae extract, which gives this formula a natural Hydration that let the hair clean & manageable. 100% free of Salt, Formaldehyde, Paraben, and drying alcohols. Cruelty-free.

IngredientDetails.title: Red Algae Extract
IngredientDetails.description: Have higher levels of minerals such as calcium than terrestrial vegetation and contain essential fatty acids omega-3 and omega-6. Rich in antioxidants and full of vitamins A, B, C and E, and protective pigments.

IngredientDetails.title: Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein
IngredientDetails.description: Reduces hair's porosity and strengthens the hair layers, making hair healthier, shinier, and easier to style. This protein increases hair's ability to receive and retain moisture. It helps reduce breakage, eliminates frizz, and tangles, and makes hair appear fuller.

IngredientDetails.title: Polyquaternium-10
IngredientDetails.description: Lightweight, flexible, and frizz-fighting conditioning agent that bonds to hair between shampoos.

IngredientDetails.title: Polyquaternium-7
IngredientDetails.description: Conditioning agent that detangles, smooths, adds shine, and fights frizz.

IngredientDetails.title: Blend of Vitamins
IngredientDetails.description: Unique combination of Vit B5, A & E used as powerful antioxidants & hydrating actives that helps smooth, soften, and strengthen the hair layers.

IngredientDetails.title: Sunflower Seed Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Contains oleic acid, which stop hair breakage. It has anti-inflammatory properties which may help calm dandruff and relieve an itchy scalp.

IngredientDetails.title: Macadamia Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in fatty acid content, the real winner for skin and hair. Those fatty acids help to add shine, strengthen, and nourish the hair follicles, macadamia oil is great for calming the hair of frizz, tangles, and dullness

IngredientDetails.title: Corn Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Helps to moisturize hair strands & preventing dryness, especially on the ends. It is a natural emollient that will moisturize the scalp and hair by keeping the hair follicles hydrated and well nourished.

IngredientDetails.title: Olive Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in omega3 acids and other nutrients that are essential for overall health, including hair health. It has the added benefit of softening the hair and relieving dry scalp.

IngredientDetails.title: Sesame Seed Oil
IngredientDetails.description: This super-absorbable oil, high in natural antioxidants (Vitamin E) with high concentration of omega-6 fatty acids and other nutrients like zinc, copper, magnesium, calcium, and iron as well as Vitamin B-6 helps moisturize, add shine, and smooth the hair shaft.

productsInformation.title: Ingredients
productsInformation.content: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide Mea, Glycerin, Peg-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Peg/Ppg-120/10 Trimethylolpropane Trioleate, Laureth-2, Amino Bis-propyl Di Methicone, Trideceth-12, Tea-dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glycol Distearate, Laureth-4, Polyquaternium-10, Polyquaternium-7, Hypnea Musciformis Extract, Atelocollagen, Glycosaminoglycans, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pantothenic Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Citric Acid, Dissodium Edta, Fragrance, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

Conditioner_Vitaoils.title: Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils Conditioner
Conditioner_Vitaoils.description: Complex of oils and vitamins with exclusive technology composed of assets that interact strongly with the hair fiber, revitalizing from its deepest layers to the most external ones. Leaves hair healthier, softer, shiny, and resistant to external aggressions.

productsInformation.title: Description
productsInformation.content: With its texture and creamy formula, promotes the cleaning of the strands with a moisturizing, reconstructive and protective action on the fiber of multi-processed hair, the Vitaoils Shampoo from Amazônia Therapy is the perfect choice for those who have chemically damaged hair.

productsInformation.title: How To Use
productsInformation.content: For best results, apply to freshly cleansed hair and comb through from roots to ends to disperse evenly. Rinse well. WARNING: For external use only. Use only as directed. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes.

productsInformation.title: What it does
productsInformation.content: Formulated with an advanced blend of minerals & vitamins, smoothing & hydrating agents, Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Conditioner fights frizz and static while adding shine. Shea Butter and a nourishing mix of oils (including Jojoba Oil, Corn Oil, Olive Oil, Macadamia oil, and Sunflower Oil) leave hair soft but not greasy or weighed down. Our unique formula nourish, improves manageability, and gives hair a healthier appearance. At a scalp-compatible acidic pH of 3.5 - 4.0, Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Conditioner, powered with Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, will not disrupt scalp’s delicate acid mantle, or cause the buildup commonly associated with heavy silicones.

productsInformation.title: What else to know
productsInformation.content: Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Conditioner is biocompatible that’s mean that contains bioavailable ingredients that does not cause irritation or disrupt the hair or scalp.FYI: Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Conditioner contains a blend of Vitamins, powerful antioxidants that protect the hair from free radicals.Sulfate Free, Paraben Free, Cruelty Free, Formaldehyde & Derivative Free, Dyes Free, 1-4 Dioxane Free, Heavy Metal Free, Drying Alcohols Free.

IngredientDetails.title: Red Algae Extract
IngredientDetails.description: Have higher levels of minerals such as calcium than terrestrial vegetation and contain essential fatty acids omega-3 and omega-6. Rich in antioxidants and full of vitamins A, B, C and E, and protective pigments.

IngredientDetails.title: Shea Butter
IngredientDetails.description: Contains vitamin A and E with essential fatty acids which are believed to add moisture and shine to the hair. Its non-greasy quality makes it an excellent moisturizer for the hair. It softens dry brittle hair and repairs split damaged ends.

IngredientDetails.title: Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein
IngredientDetails.description: Reduces hair's porosity and strengthens the hair layers, making hair healthier, shinier, and easier to style. This protein increases hair's ability to receive and retain moisture. It helps reduce breakage, eliminates frizz, and tangles, and makes hair appear fuller.

IngredientDetails.title: Polyquaternium-10
IngredientDetails.description: Lightweight, flexible, and frizz-fighting conditioning agent that bonds to hair between shampoos.

IngredientDetails.title: Polyquaternium-7
IngredientDetails.description: Conditioning agent that detangles, smooths, adds shine, and fights frizz.

IngredientDetails.title: Blend of Vitamins
IngredientDetails.description: Unique combination of Vit B5, A & E used as powerful antioxidants & hydrating actives that helps smooth, soften, and strengthen the hair layers.

IngredientDetails.title: Sunflower Seed Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Contains oleic acid, which stop hair breakage. It has anti-inflammatory properties which may help calm dandruff and relieve an itchy scalp.

IngredientDetails.title: Macadamia Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in fatty acid content, the real winner for skin and hair. Those fatty acids help to add shine, strengthen, and nourish the hair follicles, macadamia oil is great for calming the hair of frizz, tangles, and dullness

IngredientDetails.title: Corn Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Helps to moisturize hair strands & preventing dryness, especially on the ends. It is a natural emollient that will moisturize the scalp and hair by keeping the hair follicles hydrated and well nourished.

IngredientDetails.title: Olive Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in omega3 acids and other nutrients that are essential for overall health, including hair health. It has the added benefit of softening the hair and relieving dry scalp.

IngredientDetails.title: Sesame Seed Oil
IngredientDetails.description: This super-absorbable oil, high in natural antioxidants (Vitamin E) with high concentration of omega-6 fatty acids and other nutrients like zinc, copper, magnesium, calcium, and iron as well as Vitamin B-6 helps moisturize, add shine, and smooth the hair shaft.

IngredientDetails.title: Xylitol
IngredientDetails.description: Xylitol: moisturize and revitalize the hair. It has antimicrobial properties that help fight dandruff and flakes.

IngredientDetails.title: Jojoba Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in vitamins and minerals that nourish hair, including vitamin C, B vitamins, vitamin E, copper, and zinc.

IngredientDetails.title: Caprylic Acid
IngredientDetails.description: Medium-chain fatty acid with potent antibacterial, antifungal, and anti-inflammatory properties.

IngredientDetails.title: Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine
IngredientDetails.description: Helps correct the negative charge, helps detangle, reduce flyaway and static, and helps smooth the cuticle. Unlike some silicones, it does not cause buildup.

productsInformation.title: Ingredients
productsInformation.content: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Amodimethicone, C11-15 Pareth-7, Laureth-9, Trideceth-12, Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Peg-90m, Polyquaternium-7, Hypnea Musciformis Extract, Atelocollagen, Glycosaminoglycans, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pantothenic Acid, Xylitol, Caprylic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyquaternium-10, Jojoba Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Butylated Hydroxy Toluene, Lactic Acid, Dissodium Edta, Fragrance, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

Amazonia_Therapy_Vitaoils_Serum_Perfect_.title: Amazonia Therapy Vitaoils Serum Perfect Smooth
Amazonia_Therapy_Vitaoils_Serum_Perfect_.description: Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Serum Perfect Smooth protects the hair from the heat of the dryer while promoting brightness, suppleness, softness, and discipline without leaving an oily or heavy aspect.

productsInformation.title: Description
productsInformation.content: With its texture and creamy formula, promotes the cleaning of the strands with a moisturizing, reconstructive and protective action on the fiber of multi-processed hair, the Vitaoils Shampoo from Amazônia Therapy is the perfect choice for those who have chemically damaged hair.

productsInformation.title: How To Use
productsInformation.content: Apply evenly over towel-dried or dry hair and comb through. No need to rinse.

productsInformation.title: What it does
productsInformation.content: Nourishing plant oils, including Argan, Macadamia, Hazelnut, and Avocado, condition while penetrating the hair shaft to strengthen it against the high temperatures of hair straighteners and dryers. Enriched with vitamin E a powerful antioxidant that protects against free radicals. Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Serum Perfect Smooth adds strength, improves manageability, and gives hair a healthier appearance. Added to damp hair and before heat styling (or air-drying), Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Serum Perfect Smooth leaves hair feeling healthier, never sticky, greasy, or heavy.

productsInformation.title: What else to know
productsInformation.content: Amazonia Therapy™ Vitaoils Serum Perfect Smooth detangles, conditions, and protects against heat of straighteners and hair dryer, boosts shine and eliminate frizz. Sulfate Free, Paraben Free, Cruelty Free, Formaldehyde & Derivative Free, Dyes Free, 1-4 Dioxane Free, Heavy Metal Free, Drying Alcohols Free.

IngredientDetails.title: Argan Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Mainly a source of lipids and fatty acids (omega 6 & omega 9) argan oil has a richer texture, making it particularly beneficial for moisturizing skin and hair. In hair care, argan coats the Strands, providing shine while helping to condition and resisting the damage caused by heat-styling tools.

IngredientDetails.title: Macadamia Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in fatty acid content, the real winner for skin and hair. Those fatty acids help to add shine, strengthen, and nourish the hair follicles, macadamia oil is great for calming the hair of frizz, tangles, and dullness.

IngredientDetails.title: Hazelnut oil
IngredientDetails.description: Powerhouse of fatty acids, proteins, and vitamins, which can nourish hair, maintaining good hair moisturizing & glow.

IngredientDetails.title: Avocado Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Extremely rich in oleic acid and monounsaturated fats, making it one of few oils that can penetrate the hair layer and moisturize hair, rather than sitting on top and coating the hair fiber. These fats also strengthen the hair layers and help prevent breakage.

IngredientDetails.title: Vitamin E
IngredientDetails.description: Help support a healthy scalp and hair as it has natural antioxidant effects that could assist with maintaining hair growth. It has also conditioning properties that helps to repair hair cuticles, and mend split ends.

IngredientDetails.title: Phenyl Trimethicone
IngredientDetails.description: Enhances the appearance and feel of hair, by increasing hair body, suppleness, or sheen, improving the texture of hair that has been damaged physically or by chemical treatment.

productsInformation.title: Ingredients
productsInformation.content: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Paraffinum Liquidum, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Nut Oil, Tocopherol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Corylus Avellana (Hazel) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Methoxycin-namate, Benzotriazolyl Dodecyl P-cresol, Fragrance, Ci 60725, Ci 61565.

Amazonia_Therapy_Filler_Ampoules.title: Amazonia Therapy Filler Ampoules
Amazonia_Therapy_Filler_Ampoules.description: Amazonia Therapy™ Filler Ampoules has an innovative formula that acts instantly on highly disrupted and dry hair. Rich in Argan oil and sweet almond oil, it repairs the hair fiber, allowing for highly hydrated, shiny, and disciplined hair.

productsInformation.title: Description
productsInformation.content: Amazonia Therapy™ Filler Ampoules has an innovative formula that acts instantly on highly disrupted and dry hair. Rich in Argan oil and sweet almond oil, it repairs the hair fiber, allowing for highly hydrated, shiny, and disciplined hair.

productsInformation.title: How To Use
productsInformation.content: Preparation: Pour all flaconete content in a bowl, slowly add approximately 100 ml of warm water (the exact quantity of water to prepare the cream may vary depending on the desired consistency). Using a brush for mixing. Beat until you get a consistent, smooth and shiny cream. Apply on the hair, leave for half an hour and rinse thoroughly. Obs: This concentrated base may solidify in cooler days and locations. Heat the bottle with the heat of the dryer or water from the shower or sink that quickly return to the liquid state and can be used immediately.

IngredientDetails.title: Sweet Almond Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Rich in magnesium, calcium, and zinc, helps to improve the texture of the hair strands.

IngredientDetails.title: Argan Oil
IngredientDetails.description: Mainly a source of lipids and fatty acids (omega 6 & omega 9) argan oil has a richer texture, making it particularly beneficial for moisturizing skin and hair. In hair care, argan coats the Strands, providing shine while helping to condition and resisting the damage caused by heat-styling tools.

productsInformation.title: Ingredients
productsInformation.content: Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetyl Alcohol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Quaternium-70, Glycerin, PPG-1-PEG-9 Lauryl Glycol Ether, Behentrimonium Chloride, Benzotriazolyl Dodecyl P-Cresol, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Fragrance, CI 19140, CI 73015.
